## Runtime.ReadOnlyValidatingResourceTree class

Implementation of a validating resource tree that validates string inputs before delegating to the underlying tree.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ReadOnlyValidatingResourceTree<T> implements IReadOnlyValidatingResourceTree<T> 
```
**Implements:** [IReadOnlyValidatingResourceTree](./ts-res.runtime.ireadonlyvalidatingresourcetree.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;
